        Parameters:

      • performSearchAndAssertHits

        public void performSearchAndAssertHits(java.lang.String search,
                                       java.lang.Long... expectedIds)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException
        Performs a search and checks that ids are present in the result. Guarantees that only the expectedIds are present by verifying hit length equal to expectedIds
        Parameters:
        search - search to perform
        expectedIds - ids of the documents expected to be found by the search
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a communication error with the server
        org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException - if there is an error on the server

                                           org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException
        Performs a search and checks number of hits
        Parameters:
        search - search to perform
        resultCount - number of documents expected to be found by the search
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a communication error with the server
        org.apache.solr.client.solrj.SolrServerException - if there is an error on the server
